description.originalText: Solainy was a wonderful nanny for our two children (2.5, 4.5) for over a year. She is an attentive caregiver who does an amazing job scheduling playdates, driving kids to activities, arts & crafts and more! She is a safe driver and incredibly trustworthy and reliable.

description.displayText: I hired Sol in January 2021 to take care of my son, L, who was 12 months old at the time. She has been my nanny for the past 7 months up until we move to Ohio in August for to be closer to family. Sol is very reliable and dependable; I have a very busy job so it was important to have a nanny that I could depend on. Additionally, my son really loves Sol and looks forward to seeing her every day. From the moment she comes in, he asks her to pick him up and he is ready to play. It is incredibly reassuring to me that my son has bonded with Sol. Additionally, Sol has a driver's license and drives him to his play dates (some of them she has made using her nanny network), to his music class, to the pool and to his gym classes. Sol has also traveled with us out of town which made it easy for me to enjoy time with friends. I have really enjoyed having Sol as my nanny over these past few months and we will miss her very much. I certainly know that any family will be lucky to have Sol!

description.displayText: Sol was a great nanny of our beloved children, a 3 year old boy and a 4 month old baby at the time. She was with us for almost a year. She is loving, very patient, responsible and organized. She cooked, went to the playground with them, activities and play dates too, and always kept everything clean and organized. We absolutely recommend her.

description.displayText: Sol was our au pair when our youngest was just a year old. They bonded right away. Sol was so loving, nurturing, patient and gentle. She cooked, was so organized and always responsible. We would absolutely recommend sol for a sweet family needing a kind nurturing person to be with their kids.
